data.text: Winjuru, Ruoth nobed gi loch makare
Ngʼato ka ngʼato nobed kar gengʼruok
Eka wenge joma neno ok nochak ogengʼ,
Chuny ngʼat mamuomore nowinj wach gi tiende
Ok nochak oluong ngʼat mofuwo ni ngʼat malongʼo,
Nimar ngʼat mofuwo wacho weche mofuwo,
Ngʼat ma achach yorene richo,
To ngʼat mogen loso weche mabeyo
Un mon maparo ni odak e ngima maber,
Bangʼ higa achiel,
Beduru moluor un mon maparo nodak e ngima maber;
Ywaguru ka ugoyo agogu nikech puothe momewo,
kendo kuom piny joga,
Kama ochiel motegno nojwangʼ,
nyaka chop Roho ol kuomwa koa malo,
Adiera nobedie e piny motwo,
Olemb tim makare nobed kwe;
Joga nodag kuonde ma kwe nitie,
Kata obedo ni pe nolwer bunge
to mano kaka inibed ngʼama ogwedhi,
